insight: Environment: Sub-agents are currently restricted (`allowAny: false`), requiring main-session manual execution for indexing tasks.
Efficiency: The `knowledge.db` FTS5 index is significantly faster than recursive greps on the doc directory.
Project Pivot: Standing down on Robin Space physics to focus on Core RAG and Memory maintenance.
Autonomy: Maintaining `standard` autonomy for RAG tasks to ensure safety during "Janitor" pruning implementation.
